meanings: spoil, ruin, mess up, (informal) screw up, (informal) botch (up), (완전히) destroy

meanings.meaning: throw a monkey wrench in/into something

vlive.korean: 너 왜 날 망쳐? Why did you ruin me? 듣기 View video NCT : 어린이💚어른이💚모여라
켄타 형이 망쳐놨습니다. Kenta ruined it. 듣기 View video JBJ : [#7179_787] EP.21 <꽃이야> 깨알컷 대방출!
그래서 망쳐준다고? So you're going to ruin it? 듣기 View video V Beauty : [연선 Yeonsun] 더유닛 효선 아이돌에게 배워보는 걸크러쉬 메이크업 The Unit Hyosun Girl Crush Make-up
vlive.english: So you're going to ruin it?

vlive.korean: 망치면 망쳐주는 대로 또 재밌다고 - 그래서 망... It's funny if you ruin it as well... - So ruining it... 듣기 View video V Beauty : [연선 Yeonsun] 더유닛 효선 아이돌에게 배워보는 걸크러쉬 메이크업 The Unit Hyosun Girl Crush Make-up
vlive.english: It's funny if you ruin it as well... - So ruining it...

vlive.korean: "추억을 망쳐버리네". "It destroyed my memories". 듣기 View video 10PM : 목요일 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!

examples.korean: The scandal left his reputation in ruins. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 스캔들은 그의 명성을 다 망쳐 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The scandal left his reputation in ruins. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our camping trip was spoilt by bad weather. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 캠핑 여행은 날씨가 안 좋아서 망쳐 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our camping trip was spoilt by bad weather. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You really screwed up there! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 거기서 정말 망쳐 버렸어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You really screwed up there! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bad weather ruined our trip. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나쁜 날씨가 우리 여행을 망쳐 놓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bad weather ruined our trip. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She spoils the children rotten. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 아이들 버릇을 다 망쳐 놓는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
